availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Nancy J. Catlett. Father of William H. Catlett, Thomas B. Catlett, John W. Catlett, Martha E. Catlett, and Susan M. Catlett. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Lawrenceburg post office, p. 108; Find A Grave, "Francis M. 'Frank' Catlett (1827 - 1900)," Memorial #95144156, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/95144156/francis-catlett (accessed July 6, 2017).
